messages.title: The most important election of our lifetime?
messages.content: This year’s General Election is the most pivotal Britain has faced in generations.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: What we've done: 2 million more people in work. What is next: Full employment.
What we've done: 760,000 more businesses. What is next: 3 million new apprenticeships.
What we've done: Reduced income tax for 26 million people. What is next: Increase personal allowance to £12,500.
What we've done: Over 1 million more pupils in good or outstanding schools. What is next: Free childcare for 3 and 4 year olds.
What we've done: Capped benefits to reward work. What is next: Lower the benefits cap.
What we've done: Increased state pension by £950. What is next: Keep pensioner benefits including the free bus pass.

issues.economy: Full employment. Reduce income tax and increase personal allowance to £12,500. 3 million new apprenticeships.
issues.education: Over 1 million more pupils in good or outstanding schools. Free childcare for 3 and 4 year olds.
issues.socialWelfare: Capped benefits to reward work. Lower the benefits cap. Increased state pension by £950. Keep pensioner benefits including the free bus pass.

politicalExperience.achievements: Helping to bring more jobs to Lancaster.
